McFly Tweets Api

Technologies:
  • NodeJS
  • Express
  • Mongoose
DDBB:
  • MongoDB
Get All Tweets:
  • Endpiont: /api/tweets
  • Method: GET
Get Tweets marked as Favorites:
  • Endpiont: /api/tweets/favorites
  • Method: GET
Get a Tweet by Id:
  • Endpiont: /api/tweets/{id}
  • where: "{id}" is the tweet id
  • Method: GET
Toogle a tweet as favorite:
  • Endpiont: /api/tweets/{id}
  • where: "{id}" is the tweet id
  • Method: PUT
addNew:
  • Endpiont: /api/tweets
  • Method: POST
  • body:
    * "author": string | REQUIRED,
    * "content": string | REQUIRED
Result:
All McFly Api results are JSON
